column4: I recently installed Ubuntu and so far it's working great. But, I was wondering if there was any way I could get Windows to load by default when GRUB comes up. (Several people use my computer and they use Windows)
look in /boot/grub/menu.list and there's a setting for default
I'm a newbie so I don't know how to change the default setting
its a  text file, just type (in console) 'gksudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.list' and read through the file.. it's self explanatory
